bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: Multiple tests using LFW iterator are failing. DataSetIteratorTests.testLfwModel: NPE DataSetIteratorTest.testLfwIterator: failing DataSetIteratorTest.testBatchSizeOfOne: failing LocalUnstructuredDataFormatterTest.testRearrange: NPE First 3 seem to be fixed after this: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/1797>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/1797</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
